item.title: Report E-2024090102
item.description:
Report E-2024090102

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-27
  • City: JACKSON
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 27, 2024, one (1) 30-gallon drum of UN3266 was punctured in transit and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pallet. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from E3 Environmental (E3) to remediate the impacted site. E3 personnel deployed neutralizers and granular absorbents to the trailer interior and wooden pallet and swept them in with hand tools. The crew took apart the pallet and containerized it in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged drum of product was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. All spent absorbents and neutralizers were collected and containerized into the same (1) 55-gallon vented drum as the wooden pallet.

item.title: Report X-2024090238
item.description:
Report X-2024090238

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-06T09:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-26
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Aug 26th a package was discovered at our overgoods station that was damaged. The inner contents were not damaged, however the box contained approximately 20 bottles of perfumery products. A shippers declaration was found that was incorrectly filled out as well as an SDS was enclosed in the package stated that these were classified as UN1266 Perfumery Products, 3, II. The package has been placed in our hold area and is pending further disposition.
